page.title: 18CANAL SYSTEMS
page.content: The{Oxford Canal}crosses the area and joins the{Coventry Canal}in the N.W. corner of the block.No longer an industrial route,it now carries pleasure boats,both traditional and modern. An arm to the south of the motorway is preserved for owners to moor and repair their craft. Stops at Tusses Bridge, Hawkesbury and Sutton Stop have been revitalised by the canal societies and trusts to make an interesting amenity. The Pump House and other interesting buildings are being preserved and canal rallies are often held. Boat trips are also available.
